t: Are Modzori Shoes Fully Vegan? l Get it Vegan
s: July 26, 2022 - Their footwear is made in China, 100% recyclable (according to the brand), and use a combination of natural and synthetic materials. Modzori appears to be an intentionally and ethically vegan brand, rather than one that uses vegan materials out of convenience, or for other reasons.
